title: Add time to date display, gold/yellow accent colors, and default light theme

requirements.text: On the Home page (HomePage.tsx), update the date display to also show the current time alongside the date. The time should update in real time (or at least on page load/refresh) and be formatted clearly (e.g., 'Monday, June 10 · 3:45 PM').

quotes: add the time also in date along displayed

acceptanceCriteria: The home page date section displays both the current date and current time
The time format is human-readable (e.g., 12-hour with AM/PM or 24-hour)
The time updates in real time or reflects the correct time on page load

requirements.text: In the Settings page accent color picker (SettingsPage.tsx) and the app's color token definitions (index.css, tailwind.config.js, appStore.ts), add yellow, gold, and golden yellow as selectable accent color options. These should apply consistently across the app's accent-colored UI elements (buttons, highlights, active states, etc.).

quotes: need yellow and gold and golden yellow color in 'accent color'

acceptanceCriteria: The accent color picker in Settings shows at least three new options: Yellow, Gold, and Golden Yellow
Selecting any of the new accent colors applies it across all accent-styled UI elements app-wide
The new accent colors are defined as OKLCH or hex tokens consistent with the existing color system in index.css and tailwind.config.js
The chosen accent color persists across page reloads via localStorage

requirements.text: Change the app's default theme to light. In appStore.ts and the settings initialization logic in App.tsx, ensure that when no theme preference is stored in localStorage, the app defaults to the light theme instead of dark.
acceptanceCriteria: A first-time visitor (no localStorage theme value) sees the light theme
The light theme CSS variables are applied to the document root by default
Existing users with a saved theme preference are not affected — their saved choice is respected
The Settings page theme toggle reflects 'Light' as the active selection on first load

constraints: Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve all existing accent color options — only add new yellow/gold options, do not remove or rename existing ones
Keep the OKLCH-based color token system consistent with the existing index.css and tailwind.config.js conventions
nonGoals: Adding a user-configurable time format setting
Changing any backend logic or data models
Redesigning the overall theme or color system beyond adding the requested accent colors
